title: How to Make a Pineapple Shake

steps.headline: Make sure you have all the ingredients ready.
steps.description: Prepare the milk, ice cream, pineapple chunks, and cinnamon in the place you will be working in.

steps.headline: In a blender, combine all ingredients.
steps.description: Add in milk, ice cream, pineapple chunks, and cinnamon into a blender.

steps.headline: Blend until smooth.
steps.description: After adding all the ingredients needed in this recipe it's time to blend. Blend on high for a minute or until it's smooth and chuck free.

steps.headline: Pour the drink into a chilled glass.
steps.description: Transfer the drink from the blender into a chilled glass. Be careful not to make it overflow.

steps.headline: Serve immediately and enjoy!
steps.description: Add in a fancy straw or small pieces of pineapple for decoration.

text: Make sure you have all the ingredients ready. Prepare the milk, ice cream, pineapple chunks, and cinnamon in the place you will be working in. In a blender, combine all ingredients. Add in milk, ice cream, pineapple chunks, and cinnamon into a blender. Blend until smooth. After adding all the ingredients needed in this recipe it's time to blend. Blend on high for a minute or until it's smooth and chuck free. Pour the drink into a chilled glass. Transfer the drink from the blender into a chilled glass. Be careful not to make it overflow. Serve immediately and enjoy! Add in a fancy straw or small pieces of pineapple for decoration.
